step1.para: Install the snap ring in the groove of the range mainshaft ( inset, Figure 316). Install the coupler on the range mainshaft against the snap ring, clutching teeth to the rear.

figure.caption: Figure 315. Install Snap Ring and Install Coupler on Range Mainshaft

step1.para: Spread the countershaft assemblies with the splitter gear set remaining in time and install the low range gear on the shaft against the coupler, clutching teeth to the front ( Figure 317).

figure.caption: Figure 316. Install Low Range Gear on Shaft

note.para: To spread countershafts far enough to install the low range gear, move the splitter clutch to the forward position.

step1.para: Install the splined tolerance washer on the mainshaft and in hub of low range gear ( Figure 318). Rotate the washer in the groove of the mainshaft to engage external splines with clutching teeth of gear and align the keyway of washer with keyway of mainshaft.

note.para: This washer is available in varying thicknesses. Use the splined tolerance washer that provides a snug fit in the gear hub.

step1.para: Install the key in the keyway of the range mainshaft, inserting the thick end of the key in the key way of the tolerance washer to lock low range gear on the shaft ( Figure 319).

figure.caption: Figure 318. Install Key in Keyway of Range Mainshaft
